1.content:
First things first. What type of story are we looking at?


Pokemon Trainer Adventure-You "play" as the trainer. Abbreviated PTA.

A Pokemon's Life-You are born a Pokemon, you live as a Pokémon. Abbreviated PL.

Human to Pokemon-You are born as a human in this world, but wake up as a Pokemon in their world. Abbreviated HP.

Made-Up Storylines (MUS): Technically all of these stories are made up, but put made-up Pokemon in here in miscellaneous chapters that don't really need to be as organized. Just please give a vague outline of your made up Pokemon.

(If you want your custom trainer to catch your made-ups in PTA, that is perfectly acceptable, maybe even encouraged ;))
1.title: Choose a Story Type

11.content:
Are you a boy or girl?

Or a canon character?
11.title: Pokemon Trainer Adventure

1111.content:
You open your eyes, still half-asleep. You stood up too fast, almost falling over. After getting dressed, you walked downstairs, sat on the couch and flipped on the TV. You awoke with a start as you realized what day it was! It was the day they were handing out starters! You scrambled into the kitchen, scarfed down breakfast. and shot out the door. Even in your rush you stopped for a moment to breathe in the ________________ air.

(No matter what region you choose, the Pokemon from all regions will be present there.)
1111.title: Matthew

11112.content:
(Johto is my personal favorite.)

The giveaway was in Cherrygrove City, so you hopped on your bike and made your way there. (Yes, your family can afford one.) It took you about a half an hour, tantalizing Pokemon flitting about in your periphreal vision the whole way. By the time you got there, however, the line was already miles long. After waiting in line for what seemed like hours (and it probably was) a man in glasses asked for your ID and all that technical crap. He gave you your Pokedex, which, of course, also functions as your new Trainer's ID, and a new function, it hold all your minimized Poke Balls in it, negating the need for a belt. After the man helped you program your Pokedex, he asked you what starter you wanted. The available starters were:

The Traditional Starters from all seasons

Ditto

Eevee

Pikachu (For all the Ash wannabes)

Ralts
11112.title: Which Starter?

111122.content: Now what? The blob, the "cat," the "mouse," or the other thing?
111122.title: Other

choices: Go train with some of the other rookie trainers.
11112212.content: You decided to go with the Eevee for the sake of the evolutions and the cuteness! ^.^ You had no idea what you would evolve it into, you figured the two of you could figure it out. The man handed you your Pokeballs and you walked to a less crowded area. You found a small picnic area where you sat down and sent out your Eevee. Once it fully formed on the ground, it spun in a quick circle looking for its new trainer. When he spotted you, he looked up at you and mewed in his littal Eevee voice. "Hiya!" you said. "I'm Matthew." You reached out your hand and pet Eevee. He was warming up to you quickly. "Hmmm... What should your nickname be? I'll name you Neko! That's cat in japanese," you explained. He seemed to like the name, as he jumped up onto your lap and snuggled you. Now what do you do?
11112212.title: Eevee!

1113.content: What region is he from?
1113.title: NIck

11131.content: what starter do you want?
11131.title: Kanto

11132.content:
Finally! It was time to get your starter. Thank God they were giving out a wide selection. You had an idea what you wanted. You threw on your favorite outfit, packed, hopped on your bike, and rode to Violet City, where the giveaway was. By the time you got there the giveaway was almost over and the line outside the Pokemon Center was very short. Better for me, you thought. After waiting a few minutes, it was your turn.

"Name, please," the man said.

"Nick Smith," you reply.

He punches your name into the computer to verify your registration. Afterwards he turned around and took a Pokedex out of a machine.

It's got a few new features you should know about. It now holds minimized Poke balls, TM's, HM's, and keeps track of your items and Pokemon's status automatically."

"Cool."

"Now lemme just program it for you..."

Several button presses later he handed it to you and asked what starter you wanted. The available Pokemon were:

all the traditional starters from all seasons

Eevee

Pikachu

Ralts

Ditto
11132.title: Johto

1113212211.content:
"I'd like a Treeko."

He typed a little more into his computer and a Poke ball came out of the machine. He handed you the ball, checked to see if anyone was behind you, and clocked out. You shrugged and walked to a more secluded area to meet your first Pokemon. There was a picnic table further from the rest where you decided to sit down. You maximized the Poke ball and tossed it in front of you. With a flash, the Treeko emerged.

"Tree," it said.

"Treeko," you said. "I'm Nick, your trainer." You held out a hand and the two of you clenched fists. "Oh, we're gonna get along just fine. Now for a nickname. Is Gecko all right?"

"Tree," he nodded.

"It's settled then. Do you wanna' stay out of your ball for a while?"

He nodded again.

"Let's go find another rookie to train with!"

You looked around the immeadiate area. To the right were several 10-year-olds who were obviously very amatuerish, who should be easy to beat. To the left were there was a girl around your age with long, blond hair petting her new Eevee. Who do you go to?
1113212211.title: Gecko the Treeko

11132122112.content:
You sat at a table closer to the girl to learn more about her. She wore a belt, like you, despite the Pokedex. You could tell her and her Eevee were hitting it off well, much as you and Treeko. (I'll leave out the details of her appearance so she can look however you want.) You eyed her until she looked your way and you made eye contact. You held it for a few seconds, smiled, and looked away. Then you watched her out of the corner of your eye and grinned as you noticed she was looking back at you. Bam. She was interested.

After she glanced at you a few more times, you sat down next to her, but not too close.

"You a rookie too?" you say.

"Yup," she replied. "Just got my Eevee a moment ago. Isn't that right, Star?"

"Vee!"

"We might change her name when she evolves."

"Ya?" you reply. "I got a Treeko. Wanna have a little friendly battle?"

"Sure, my name's Anna."

"Nick."
11132122112.title: Anna

111321221121.content:
The two of you found an unused battle area, and you began the battle by shouting, "Leer!" Gecko glared (not the move) at Star, unnerving her.

"Tail Whip, Star!"

"Gecko! Look away!" He whipped around, crossed his arms, and stared at you as Star's Tail Whip did nothing. "Pound her!"

"Tackle!"

You almost told Treeko to feint at the last moment, but you were too slow and they crashed together on Anna's side of the field.

"Keep Pounding!"

"Tackle again!" Since this was their first battle, it really came down to who hit fastest and hardest. Gecko definitely had Star beat for speed, and Star collapsed within moments, partially thanks to the Leer. Anna recalled Star with a compliment and said, "I'da had you if that Tail Whip hit."

"Maybe," you said. After getting your Pokemon healed up at the Pokemon Center, you said, "It's getting late already, you wanna meet again tomorrow?"
111321221121.title: Battle With Anna

1113212211211.content: "Sounds great!" you reply. The two of you dropped of your pokemon at the pokemon center and went your separate ways. You went to a hotel, being able to afford it. There was nothing on TV so you decided to go straight to bed. It was only ten, so there was no need to set the alarm, as you rarely sleep in.
1113212211211.title: To Bed!

11132122112112.content:
By the time you picked up Gecko and had a quick chat, you still had an hour and a half till noon, so you decided to visit the Poke Mart. You were on your way to the checkout counter with a few super potions and Poke balls when two TM's caught your eye, but you only had enough cash to spare for one.


(Man, I made this hard!)
11132122112112.title: Shopping

111321221121122.content:
You decided to go with Brick Break, since it was a strong move that would be useful even after evolution. By the time you got to Route 31, there was still about a half an hour until Anna was supposed to meet you here, so you picked a bench, sent out Gecko, taught him the TM, and relaxed. Your eyes were just about to shut when a wild Pokemon caught your eye, what was it?

(Try to keep the "something else" choices going, but they don't have to have every Pokemon.)
111321221121122.title: Second Pokemon!

1113212211211221.content:
You couldn't believe your luck. Gligar is really rare in this part of Johto, and your dream team was already 1/3 of the way done! If you catch it of course. It was perched on a tree, facing away from you, so you decide to sneak attack it. You tap Gecko on the shoulder and motion towards it. He understands, nods, and sneaks towards the tree. Once he was about halfway up the tree he looked at you and you mouthed the words, "Brick Break." Gecko leaped towards the Gligar, and swung his fist at its back, only for it to dodge at the last second. He was toying with you. The Gligar flew out of Gecko's reach and taunted him while Gecko Leered him, but it had no effect. "DAMN IT!" you shout. It was just your luck for you to find a Gligar and have no projectile moves. The Gligar had a type advantage, and he knew it. He could've flown away and just left you standing there, but he accepted your challenge and dove towards Gecko. He didn't need to be told to dodge and practically closelined the bat, causing him to crash into the ground, and Gecko took the opportunity to smash him in the back. He screeched in pain and you almost felt sorry for him, until he turned and gave Gecko a nasty scratch on the face. He lifted off into the air, having some trouble. You got an idea, looked at Gecko and said, "Do you know how to play chicken?" He grinned, Gligar screeched then swooped down as Gecko charged him. At the last second Gecko did a sudden frontflip/jump and slammed his tail into Gligar, ramming him into the ground again. Gligar quickly flipped over and started slashing Gecko mercilessly, and Gecko returned the favor. They were moving so fast you couldn't tell who was winning, until one final Brick Break caused Gligar to skid away, unconcious. Gecko fainted soon after. You recalled him, caught Gligar, and named him Skorpio.

"Nice catch!" You whipped around and there was Anna.

"Oh, you saw that? Gecko got beat up pretty bad, let's go to the Pokemon Center."
1113212211211221.title: Skorpio

11132122112112212.content: After healing your Pokemon, the two of you headed back to Route 31 to relax... Or catch more Pokemon. Whatever happens. You introduced Skorpio to everyone and you all gathered around a picnic table. Skorpio and Gecko were racing while Star curled up on Anna's lap and Anna pet her. Anna told you about her life before Pokemon training, about her typical obnoxious brothers, about her first boyfriend, about the reason she didn't start her Pokemon journey at ten, (her mother was somewhat overprotective) and basically anything else that came to her mind. Then you proceeded to tell her about your single father, how he needed your help to keep the family business afloat, and how he just recently got remarried which was when you left. You felt that the two of you bonded really well and she was becoming more interested in you. You were just about to the leaning-her-head-on-your-shoulder phase when she gasped and sent Star toward a...
11132122112112212.title: Chatting with Anna

111321221121122122.content: Do you want to watch this fight or fast foward?
111321221121122122.title: |>|> or |>?

1113212211211221221.content: Star barely managed to take down the Pidgey, so the two of you hurried back to the Pokemon Center yet again. Anna named the female Pidgey, Tori. (Japanese for bird.) By the time you got to the Pokemon Center, the sun was starting to set and the two of you went seperate ways, with a plan to train tomorrow. You stopped by the Poke Mart and bought more potions for both of you and went to sleep. The next morning, you and Anna ate breakfast and were trying to decide how to start training.
1113212211211221221.title: Yet Another Trip to the Pokemon Center

11132122112112212212.content: Star's dodging was only mediocre when she fought Gecko and Tori, so you decided to fix that. Gecko would charge her while she stood still and dodged to start. Gecko never changed directions, so that was an easy warm-up. Then they played chicken. There were a few epic fails involved, but after a bit of that and having Gecko AND Tori trying to tackle her at the same time, she was much better. What did you work on next?
11132122112112212212.title: Working on Star's Dodging

111321221121122122122.content:
"All right," started Nick. Gecko and Star were listening intently as Nick and Anna described multiple strategies for attacking flying enemies without long-range moves.

"One of the most effective methods is to simply dodge until they get close enough to hit," Anna added.

"If they are just out of reach, you can usually jump off something, like a tree or wall, to reach them."

"As we saw when Gecko was fighting Skorpio, feinting can also be very effective."

After about ten minutes of practicing these different methods, the sun had started to set and you decided to meet for breakfast and challenge Falkner the next day.
111321221121122122122.title: Attacking Flying Enemies

1113212211211221221222.content:
(We're gonna say that Falkner has no apprentices in this storyline.)

The two of you scarfed down a quick breakfast and headed straight for the gym. You hoped to catch Falkner while he was still tired, but unfortunately, he was a morning person and was looking wide awake as you strolled up to him. "Two early birds, eh?" He said. "Who wants to go first?"
1113212211211221221222.title: Who First?

choices: the doors to the gym burst open.
nothing happened!  Get on with it!
11132122112112212212222.content:
"Go, Star!"

"Go, Pidgey!"

Anna quickly ordered a Swift (thank God for TM's) that sent Pidgey reeling. Falkner shouted to use Whirlwind when he recovered. Star made a valiant effort to dodge, but was hit anyway since it's hard to dodge wind. She was slammed into the wall but stood up quickly. "Another Swift!" shouted Anna. Star didn't seem to mind attacking from a distance and sent another shower of stars at Pidgey. Falkner looked exasperated, he usually fought 10-year olds with no skill, but this was ridiculous. He had, however, that Star seemed to shy from physical attacks and ordered a Peck. "Dodge!" Eevee lept out of the way and Pidgey was knocked unconcious as he slammed into the wall.

"Now you're in for it!" Falkner shouted. "Go, Pidgeotto!"

The bird pokemon materialized and spread its wings. Star had a little flicker of fear in her eyes, and Pidgeotto screeched loudly. "Tail Whip, Star!" shouted Anna.

"Sand-attack!" Falkner shouted. The two attacks hit simultaneously; Star stepped back a few steps and tried to rub the sand out of her eyes, while Pidgeotto couldn't help but feel sorry for Star.

"Swift!"

Falkner employed the use of his choiciest swear words, he forgot all about Swift, that made Sand-Attack useless! "Peck! As fast and hard as you can!" Star sent some stars at Pidgeotto, and he flew right through them.

"Scratch!" Anna yelled. The two Pokemon collided in a flurry of fur and feathers that lasted seconds. Star was thrown from the fray with a thud and was unconcious, but Pidgeotto had a pained look in his eyes. (For multiple reasons.) Anna sent out Tori with a confident look in HER eyes. When Pidgeotto saw his opponent, he sprang into action and took off. Tori followed suit. They circled the arena for a bit, until Falkner ordered a Whirlwind. "Whirlwind back at him!" Anna shouted. The two miniature tornadoes impacted in the exact center of the circle they were flying, and the resulting backlash sent both Pokemon spiraling towards the ground. "Divebomb him!"

"Pull up, Pidgeotto!" but it was no use. Tori, for whatever reason, was higher than Pidgeotto, and had a bird's eye view (pardon the pun) of Pidgeotto, and hit her target perfectly. They both slammed into the ground with Tori on top, and Pidgeotto was motionless. Falkner sighed, recalled Pidgeotto, and flicked a badge in Anna's direction like a quarter. Pidgey flew up and caught it, however, and gave it to Anna. Anna returned Tori and picked a bench to watch YOU battle Falkner. But just then...
11132122112112212212222.title: Anna Vs. Falkner

111321221121122122122221.content:
The doors to the gym burst open, and in stomped the last thing you expected to see. It was a stunning girl who looked to be exactly your age, and was dressed in exactly your style. Your jaw dropped before you could stop yourself and you desperately hoped Anna didn't see. "I WANT A REMATCH!" she screamed at the top of her lungs. "RIGHT HERE, RIGHT NOW!" You recognized blind rage when you saw it, and backed off.

"Whoa, Kara," Falkner said delicately.

"I'M NOT KARA, I'M MAYA YOU FUCKING RETARD!" Even though steam was almost literally shooting out of her ears, you couldn't help but be impressed. She had no respect for authority unless they've earned it, it seemed, and you liked that. You found yourself in a very difficult situation, listening to Maya scream her head off. You REALLY wanted to get to know Maya better, but you were practically going out with Anna. You decided to risk interrupting her to say that she could go before you.

"Um, Maya?"

"WHAT!?" she whipped towards you.

"I was just gonna say that you can go before me, I've got time." Then something even weirder happened. Her eyes got a dazed look and you wondered if she had an aneurism or something. It only lasted a few seconds, and when it faded she had a totally different expression. She looked like a totally different person, who was happy and grateful.

"Why thank you," she said with such a polite voice that you almost got whiplash. "Well, let's get this over with, Falkner." You could have sworn that Falkner's eyes were now the size of beach balls as Maya's eyes glazed over again. This time when they returned to normal, they looked like they belonged to someone who thought they knew everything. Your jaw dropped yet again when she pressed a button on her PokeTech and her entire outfit changed color and look. Where she had black cargo pants, she now had green, pocketless shorts. Where before there was short, black hair, now it was long, blond, and straight. Glasses materialized on her face and, yet again, she looked like a different person. "You are so screwed this time," she said. "I've got an unbeatable strategy."
111321221121122122122221.title: Kara, Maya, What?

1113212211211221221222211.content:
"FALKNER" said a girl whith brown eyes a pink top,red scurt,brown boots and golden hair. "I WANT A REMATCH!" "you two I am in a battle all redy with your twin." WHAT SHE BEAT MY!" "Take a seat Kara."
"Go cyndaquil "cinda." Go pidgey" pidgey collapsed "sorry gys my pokemon nead to rest sorry" "WHAT"
1113212211211221221222211.title: And now for Kara.

11132122112112212212222111.content: "Those twins have a bed temper" whisper Anna "I now know." Kara changes clothes from a pink top to a dark green jumper red hair in a odd style the boots turned in to trainers and the scurt transformed into black trousers. Whilst it was happening Falkner slipped in to a side room. "Lets go" said Anna "right behind you." "By Nick" by Anna." Wall you are walking do you see a
11132122112112212212222111.title: The twins are mad.

"Sorry um hi i'm Nick" "Tim i'm learning how to be a pokemon breeder" "im learning how to be a pokemon trainer. i've got to meat hear tomorrow at 2:00 pm" "ok see you tomorrow bye"

11132122112112212212222111112.content: "Ahh A pichu how cute" "piiichhh" "AAAAAAAAAAAAW right it's on go Star swift" "pichu." (pichu youses Uses Thunder) "finish it whith swift" "pichu." Go pokeball" yes I got a pichu" "well done" "yes well done" "Ralts" Bravo Anna" "Fred hi" "Fred who is Fred?" "My old school mate" "want to have a battel Anna"

111321221121122122122221111121.content: "Shur go Tori" "swinub go" "swin" "prrrrrprrrr" "ice beam Swinub NOW" "Anna watch out" Nick jumps pushing Anna out of the way "AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA" you scream you are frozen in ice! "FRED what are you playing at! We have to get himto pokemon center fast!" "Well look at the time good by Anna Tell your frozen friend good bye by." "By" "come on Tim help my" "right"

"Tim look at you you are a cyndaquil!" "You can talk totodile Anna you are a chikorita Jon you'r a pikachu!" "Yes my spell worked you are going to be pokemon for"

111321221121122122122221111121121112.content: "Clampearl harden" "um hi" "Hi" "Leave these people alone!" "But they're Pokemon" "no they are pepole now go" "ok weirdo." "so how is it like being pokemon?" " I'll tell you what it's like!" "Niko no!"
111321221121122122122221111121121112.title: Is Anna safe.

choices: She was ordering an ice cream cone across the street.
1113212211211221221222212.content:
Maya sent out a Porygon. Wow, he really was screwed. "You know what to do!" Maya said. Sure enough, the Porygon's skin gained a silvery metallic sheen. Falkner had a horrified look on his face. He just stood there, shaking. He didn't even reach for a Poke ball, he just threw Maya a badge. Maya stood motionless for a moment with her back to you and you realized she was probably freezing up again. Your insides gave a twitch when she switched her clothes back to the ones that were so strangely similar to yours. "What now, punk? Not so tough now are ya?"

You nearly jumped out of your skin when Anna came up behind you and tapped you on the shoulder. Anna laughed a bit and whispered in your ear that Anna already had a boyfriend, and to go after Maya. You had another weird feeling somewhere between a leap of joy and a stomachache. Even though you liked Maya, Anna had really grown on you too. Would she still follow you around? You turned to her with a confused look on your face and she said that her boyfriend was out of the country so she would be happy to accompany you until he got back. That took part of the weight off your shoulders, but you still had to go talk to Maya, and you had absolutely no idea how that would turn out. Maya swaggered out the door before you realized what was happening and you shouted to Falkner that you would be back within the hour.
1113212211211221221222212.title: Maya Vs. Falkner.

11132122112112212212222122.content:
You whipped out your wallet and decided to approach her on the pretext of ordering your own ice cream; you were so intent on not making a fool of yourself that you didn't even notice that she changed clothes again. Now she was wearing a lot of orange and had her hair in a strange style you had never seen before. It looked curled, only it wasn't. It was in zig-zags and it was shoulder-length. You didn't notice until she turned around, ice cream in hand, with yet another facial expression. Now she just looked full of energy and like she would start running around randomly at any moment. You had no idea what to think of this and let her walk away again. You decided to follow her until you saw another good opportunity to say hello. You took your chance after she changed her clothes back to green and started complaining to the ice cream man that her ice cream was made from 2% milk and not skim like she requested (she could tell becuase of the way it was melting and the amount of shine it gave when exposed to the sun). You decided to take the direct approach.

"Hey, Maya!" She didn't respond at first and you had to repeat her name before you got an answer. It wasn't what you expected though. She switched her clothes back to your style (dark blue and black), THEN turned to talk to you.

"What's up?" She followed by licking her ice cream, not seeming to care that it was 2% anymore.

"I was just wondering how you keep changing clothes like that," you asked.

"Oh, it's just an app my dad invented for the Poketech. It's really nice to have."

"Your dad? He works for the Poketech company?"

"Ya, he's their chief inventor. It's pretty sweet, I have every single app for this thing," she said with a gesture towards her watch.

"Ya, I bet," you replied. "Listen, I'm gonna go kill Falkner, you wanna come and watch?"

She thought for a moment, frowned and said, "What about that girl you were with? I don't do cheaters."

"No, no, no," you quickly say, "she actually gave me permission to come see you, she's waiting for me in the gym now."

She thought a little more, bit the top half of her ice cream cone off, and said, "Alright, but if she's not there, I"m out."
11132122112112212212222122.title: 2%=Bad

choices: Falkner decides to take out his rage at Maya on you!
111321221121122122122221221.content:
You couldn't wait to see the look on Falkner's face when you walked back in with his worst nightmare. Sure enough, it was priceless. You waved to Anna on the bench and Maya walked over while you prepared for battle. "Did you really give him permission?" she asked with an incredulous look.

"Yes."

"Why did you need to give him permission?"

"He was hitting on me, and when he saw you he tried to hide that he wanted to go after you, so I just told him that I already had a boyfriend."

"Do you really, or were you just being nice?"

"No, I really do, he's out of the country."

"Go, Gecko!"

The battle was on. Falkner sent out his Pidgey with a smirk, he obviously thought this would be an easy win, but boy was he suprised when Gecko dashed up and smashed Pidgey with a Brick Break. He shouted to stay at a distance and use Whirlwind a lot, all of which Gecko expertly dodged. Pidgey drifted close to one wall and you told Gecko to wall-jump. "GET AWAY FROM THE WALL!" Falkner shouted, but it was too late. By the time Pidgey registered his command, Gecko was half-way through a frontflip directly above Pidgey. Just when Pidgey attempted to move out of the way, he was slammed into the ground by Gecko's tail. Two attacks had taken down Pidgey.

"Ha, ha, ha! This is too easy!" you said.

"Don't get cocky yet!" Falkner replied. He sent out Pidgeotto. "I've been saving this for a special occasion," and he pulled an X Speed out of his pocket.

"OH NO YOU DON'T!" May shouted. The next thing you knew, a blur had swiped the X Speed from Falkner's hand. When it slowed down, you saw it was a Sneasel. "You are NOT pulling THAT trick again!"

"HEY!" Now it was Falkner's turn to shout. "THAT IS A DIRECT VIOLATION OF THE POKEMON GYM CODE OF CONDUCT!!!"

"Ya, it might be," Maya said a little too calmly. "But 1., So is being a dishonorable scumbag, and 2., you're not gonna do anything about it, are you?"

Falkner opened his mouth as to say something, but then closed it with a beaten look on his face (I use that phrase a lot, don't I?).
111321221121122122122221221.title: Nick Vs. Falkner

1113212211211221221222212212.content:
You decided to switch to Skorpio and use Gecko as a last resort. You ignored Falkner's tirade at you and sent him out. "RIP HIS WINGS OFF!" Falkner bellowed.

"Open with a Sand-Attack!" This probably should have been mentioned earlier, but the floor of Falkner's gym is sand so that Falkner's birds can use Sand-Attack. Talk about ironic! Pidgeotto rolled his eyes and realized he was on his own again. He didn't really feel like sand in his eyes, so he stayed high. You were about to give Skorpio another command when he pulled off an amazing move. He flew as fast as possible in a tight spiral directly underneath Pidgeotto, and used Sand Tomb! "Woah! Nice!"

"WHIRLWIND!' Pidgeotto did just that and dissipated the tornado of whirling grit, but not before Skorpio launched a Sand-Attack at his face and landed a Poison Sting on his back. Pidgeotto launched himself at Skorpio and connected, but got stung again anyway. Skorpio was really a lemon to lemonade guy, um, bat. Falkner's rage was starting to pour over onto Pidgeotto, and he abandoned all caution and decided to melee this Gligar. It reminded you a lot of how Star Vs. Pidgeotto went, except no fur. When the blurs unblurred, Skorpio was unconcious. However, Pidgeotto collapsed within seconds. Apparently one of those Poison Stings poisoned him.
1113212211211221221222212212.title: Skorpio Vs. Pidgeotto

11132122112112212212222122121.content:
Falkner sighed. "This just isn't my day..." He didn't even attempt to throw you the badge, he just dropped it and walked into a side room. The girls gave you some mild applause and you struck a pose.

"Very nice, very nice," Maya complimented. "That Gligar of yours was something."

"Thanks," you said.

"You guys wanna grab some brunch?" Anna asked.

"Hell yea!" you and Maya shout in stereo.


You went a few blocks away to a deli and all ordered sandwiches. And from all the choices available, you and Maya got almost the exact same thing. The only difference was light mayo vs. mayo. "So," Maya said. "Where you guys from?" You told her you were from Cherrygrove and Anna said she was from Goldenrod City. "Cool." Maya said. "I'm from right here in town. As a matter of fact..." she casually pointed south, "That one is mine." It was a nice house. It took up twice the space as most of the other houses, and was two stories. It had a balcony on the top floor directly above the porch. More small talk followed, without enough significance to be mentioned. When you finished eating, it was around one, with the sun only just starting to move back down the sky.

"So, who's Kara?" you said.

Panic. You could see it in her eyes. You wondered how eyes that confident could suddenly look so fearful. Then she froze. "Maya? You okay?" She exhaled deeply. A button press, and she wore all white.

"A twin," She said. "Kara is my twin."
11132122112112212212222122121.title: Chillin With Maya

choices: Maya appears again later that day.
111321221121122122122221221212.content:
"So, anyway," Anna said. "We're all three heading to Azalea Town next, right?"

Both you and Maya nodded. "Well, are we going together?"

"Well, I know I will be," you replied. "What about you, Maya?"

"I'd love to,but I'll really busy in town this week, so I guess I have to give you a head start!" Maya laughed. Yet another noticeable difference in her attitude, but you shrugged it off. "I gotta be home now, bye!"

You waved sadly as she ran off. "So i guess we're leaving tomorrow morning?" you said.

"Looks like it."

"Do you think we'll see her again?"

"Definitely."
111321221121122122122221221212.title: Heading to Azalea

choices: Maya enters, wondering why you were running.
She doesn't and the two of you leave.
1113212211211221221222212212121.content:
Needless to say, you were bummed the next morning that Maya wasn't coming with you, although it helped that Anna was trying super hard to cheer you up. You ate breakfast and couldn't get her out of your mind. You wondered about her mysterious twin sister and clothes-changing habits. Time got away from you and Anna had to snap you out of your reverie at about noon. "Hey, Mr. Lonely! We need to get going soon."

"Oh yeah," you replied. You grumbled all the way out of town when you realized you forgot to try to catch a very specific pokmon in Sprout Tower! "Oh, shit! Wait for me at the Pokemon Center, Anna! This will only take a second!" You sprinted to the Poke Mart, hurriedly bought a Dusk Ball, then flew past Falkner's gym towards the colossal building. When you dragged yourself into the Pokemon Center a few minutes later, you had your freshly caught Gastly healed and opted to nickname him Shade.
1113212211211221221222212212121.title: Quickie Capture

choices: "No, actually I haven't!  Let's check it out."
11132122112112212212222122121212.content: You finally caught your breath and the two of you were walking towards Union Cave and Anna asked if you had been the the Ruins of Alph.
11132122112112212212222122121212.title: Ruins of Alph?

111321221121122122122221221212121.content: Your walk down Route 32 was uneventful and kind of awkward since your meeting with Maya. You had trained Shade a bit fighting wild Bellsprouts, but they weren't much of a challenge. Gecko was enjoying the nice weather and Scorpio was roaming around in the treetops with Tori. Star was perched on Anna's shoulder getting her ear scratched. You all took a break under the Magnet Train rail when two random trainers approached and asked for a double battle.
111321221121122122122221221212121.title: Double Battle

choices: Shade plays a lewd prank on Anna in the night.
You wake up with no surprises.
1113212211211221221222212212121212.content:
Neither team knew what two Pokemon the other was using, but of course the other team cleverly sent out a Plusle and Minun as you and Anna sent out Scorpio and Tori, much to her dismay.

"Charge you two!" the opponents shouted in unison.

"Scorpio! Sand Tomb!"

"Tori! Sand Attack!" Your combo attack worked perfectly. Scorpio surrounded the mice with a tornado of sand, reducing visibility and disrupting their teamwork. Tori followed up by blowing some of the swirling dust straight into the opponents' eyes.

"Scratch!" you yelled.

"Tackle!" Anna cheered. The poor mice didn't last long, being relatively helpless in the dust devil. After you collected your prize money, you hiked the rest of the way to the Pokemon Center at the entrance to Union Cave. Preferring nature to a less-than-comfortable sofa, the two of you decided to camp outside.

A few hours later, the sun had set, the tents were up, and a nice warm fire was burning in the middle. You sat on the ground and stared into the fire, thinking of Maya yet again. You had some nice quiet conversation with Anna; Shade played some pranks on everyone, including making an apple float away from a hungry Eevee and scaring Scorpio as he was sleeping. You built up the fire a little bit, roasted some hot dogs, and dozed off shortly after.
1113212211211221221222212212121212.title: Tricky Matchup

choices: Star wakes up first, because she got cold from being away from Anna.
11132122112112212212222122121212121.content:
(Woot! First sexual chapter of the story! I always have fun writing these ;) )

Anna was sleeping peacefully when Shade drifted over to her. Shade knew this prank would take a lot of energy and focus, since he wasn't that powerful yet, but it would be worth it in the end. First, he carefully unzipped her sleeping bag all the way and moved Star away from Anna so that she wouldn't wake. He then began the long, painstaking process of removing all her clothes, piece by piece, extremely slowly and carefully. He started with the easiest part, her gloves. All he had to do was raise her hands a bit, slip them off, and throw them towards the thicker part of the woods Shade took a moment to decide what to remove next, and decided the shirt and bra would go first. He chuckled silently as he deliberately made her sit up in her sleep and slid it up and off her body. The shirt was then sent behind the Pokemon Center. Shade was getting really excited when Anna mumbled a bit in her sleep so he gently laid her back down and waited for her to drift back into her deep sleep. Shade took a closer look at Anna's pink bra. It wasn't anything special, and it was the kind that fastened in the back. He made her sit up again and smoothly slipped the bra off, exposing her pert b-cup breasts to the world. It was chilly with the fire out and her nipples were hard as rock. Shade softly licked them each a few times then laid her down to fall back asleep completely. Finally, he raised her legs at a 45 degree angle and slowly slid off both her red pants and pink panties. Shade took a good, long, close-up look at her pussy, but he also obscured the narrator's view of it, so I can't honestly say what it looks like right now. (That will be in the next "Spectrophilia" chapter.) Shade scattered her clothes nearby and poured a canteen around Nick's sleeping bag, so that he would not be blamed since there were no footprints. Shade took care of some "ghostly business," don't ask how, then went to sleep next to Nick, waiting for the fun to begin.
11132122112112212212222122121212121.title: Spectrophilia:  Lost Clothes

choices: They wake up the next day.
Shade wakes up early and notices his plot was thwarted.
111321221121122122122221221212121212.content:
Star shivered and woke up with a twitch. "Why am I all the way over here?" she said to herself. Groggily, she made her way back over to Anna and noticed that her bare back was facing her. Star could not see her clothes anywhere nearby, so she nuzzled the back of Anna's head until she woke.

"Uugh, why is it so cold?" was her first response. She rolled over towards Star, still oblivious. "Why'd you wake me up?" Star shielded her eyes and Anna finally understood. "Oh my God where did my clothes go?!" Star sniffed Anna and tried to sniff out their locations while Anna silently put on her shoes and wrapped up in a towel. Star finally found her shirt behind the Pokemon Center and brought it to Anna. She placed it in her tent and helped Star look for the rest. They found one glove in a tree and the other close by. They had some trouble finding the rest until Star found her panties and jeans quite a distance away. Anna slipped them on quickly as Star kept going back towards Violet City. She quickly lost the scent, however, and turned to camp. Anna went ahead and slipped on her shirt. Star found one last trace of Anna's scent and found her last article of clothing, her bra, near the entrance to Union Cave. They walked back to camp while Anna put on her bra under her shirt. "Who could have done this?" Star tilted her head in a display of confusion. Anna checked the campsite for any evidence and found none, other than the fact that the ground around Nick was wet with water. 'Whoever did this specifically wanted to be sure that Nick was not blamed,' she thought to herself. Shaken as she was, Anna laid back down and tried to get some more shut eye before the sun rose.
111321221121122122122221221212121212.title: Dressing in the Night

1113212211211221221222212212121212121.content:
The sun eventually rises over your campsite, creating a dazzling array of colors. The sun shines in your eyes, waking you up. You stretch and go into your tent to change. The sun accompanied with the noise of your awakening also woke Anna. She was still on edge from last night, and she felt really insecure when getting dressed in her own tent. By the time the two of you got dressed and packed up camp, all of the Pokemon were awake, and you recalled all of them. "You ready for this, Anna?" you asked.

"Of course," she replied, although she was really quite suspicious of you. The entrance to Union Cave loomed ominously and the two of you boldly stepped through. It wasn't too teribbly dark, but it still hampered your progress. You didn't get far, however, before a voice called out.

"You! Trainer! I challenge you!" But who were they talking to?
1113212211211221221222212212121212121.title: Tackling Union Cave

11132122112112212212222122121212121211.content:
"You with the blue hair! I challenge you!" Out of the shadows steps a boy near your age with long red hair over one eye and an all black outfit with red accents. "Three on three, if you have three that is."

"I do," you answer. "You're on." The two of you find a rather open area in the cave. It's a little darker here than in the rest of the cave. This should make for an interesting battle. You both simultaneously throw your Poke Balls and out come.....
11132122112112212212222122121212121211.title: A Rival?

111321221121122122122221221212121212111.content:
"Go, Ebon!" shouted your opponent as you sent out Shade. A short, little, tan thing popped out of his ball.

"Gasp! A shiny!" Anna exlaimed. Sure enough, the enemy sparkled a bit.

"No matter!" you say. "Use the darkness to your advantage, Shade!" Shade faded into the black surroundings and the enemy's Axew glanced around for it.

"Ebon! Dragon Rage!" The foe let loose a stream of blue fire in a random direction, but missed. "Keep trying!"

"Shade! Curse!" Shade lets out a low groan as he hurts himself, and Ebon used Dragon Rage in that direction, scoring a direct hit and knocking out Shade.

"Ha," he said. "Good luck having any Pokemon survive long against Dragon Rage." You groaned and sent out Gecko, hoping that he could evade Dragon Rage until Curse did its job.

"Stay at a distance and dodge!" you command. Gecko nods and uses his sticky hands to climb onto a wall, then leaps to the ceiling when Ebon tries to hit him.

"Enough! Now use Dual Chop!" The Axew lunged forward, cathing Gecko off guard and landing two consecutive blows on his chest.

"Fight back with Brick Break!" Ebon tried to dodge, but was distracted by the growing pain of the Curse and took the attack head on. He flew a short distance away and got back up, thought the Curse drained the rest of his energy and he fainted. The opposing trainer grimaced and recalled him. Next he sent out.....
111321221121122122122221221212121212111.title: Vs. Ebon

choices: You get to Azalea Town without incident.
Something else happens in the cave.
1113212211211221221222212212121212121111.content:
Now it was your turn to grimace as your opponent sent out his starter, a shiny yellow Charmeleon. The light from his tail flame illuminated the cavern and made it impossible to hide. You decided to quickly switch before Gecko got himself beaten. You only have one conscious Pokemon left, of course, and you sent out Skorpio.

"Hellfire, use Ember as he's coming out!" As soon as Skorpio materialized, Hellfire slamed his fiery tail into Skorpio, causing a moderate amount of damage.

"Sand Tomb!" Skorpio did his thing, trapping Hellfire.

"Smokescreen!" Hellfire bellowed out a huge cloud of smoke; now neither combatant could see, although Hellfire was still taking damage.

"Harden while he's distracted!" Skorpio toughened his skin by focusing. While he was doing so, Hellfire managed to break free from the Sand Tomb.

"Dragon Rage!" 'Great, more blue fire,' you thought. The azure flame grazed Skorpio as he dived to the right, but still hurt.

"Sand-attack! Aim well!" The Gligar squinted, trying to see through the persistent smoke to aim.

"Scratch! Quickly!" Hellfire and Skorpio made eye contact through the blackness, then charged each other. Hellfire scraped his claw against Skorpio as Skorpio blew a significant amount of dust into Hellfire's eyes. The Scratch downed the weakened Gligar, and the Charmeleon could barely see anything now that there was both smoke and sand. You quickly sent out Gecko and ordered a Brick Break. While Hellfire was still blind, Gecko landed a strong blow right to the Charmeleon's forehead, knocking him out cold. The opposing trainer facepalmed and sent out his last Pokemon, a little Aron named Brimstone. "Try not to get hit and use Headbutt!"

"Brick Break again!" Both Pokemon ran towards each other again. The Aron should be finished quickly since Brick Break is quadruply effective, but Gecko wasn't exactly in prime condition either. Gecko tried to jump at the last minute and hit Brimstone in the back, but he also leapt into the air and Gecko got Headbutted in the chest. Gecko landed, panting. The Aron was still in prime condition, although Gecko probably couldn't take another Headbutt. "Come on, Gecko! One Brick Break and it's over!" Gecko charged a final time, and so did Brimstone. Neither Pokemon jumped this time, and both took massive damage from the collision. A crack went down Brimstone's skull and Gecko's fist crumbled from the combined force. Both were seriously wounded, and the battle ended in a tie.

Your opponent quickly withdraws the crippled Aron. "We'll meet again," he says as he steps back into the shadows. You also withdraw Gecko and heal Shade, since he is the only one who doesn't need real medical attention.

"That was intense," Anna says.

"Ya," you reply. "We need to hurry and get through this cave."
1113212211211221221222212212121212121111.title: Vs. Hellfire and Brimstone

1113212211211221221222212212121212121111.content:
The two of you burst from the cave exit and into the Pokemon Center. You hurriedly give your Poke balls to the nurse and collapse on a sofa. Anna giggled at your actions and sat across from you. "Tired much?" she asked.

"No, what are you talking about?" you replied. Even though you had fought that tough trainer and gotten through the cave, it was still in the early afternoon. Just then, Anna's cell phone rang. She expertly whipped it out and smiled. It was her boyfriend. She didn't tell you this, however, and walked outside to take the call. You didn't have to wait long for your Pokemon to get healed, although they warned you to be careful with Gecko's hand for a day or two. You nodded at them and went to find Anna.
1113212211211221221222212212121212121111.title: Azalea Town

choices: You trained in the Slowpoke Well.
1113212211211221221222212212121212121111.content:
You finally spotted Anna, who was sitting on a bench near Azalea Forest.



"What are you doing over there?" you asked once you caught up to her.



"Sitting, what's it look like?" she replied sarcastically. You only glared back playfully. "Okay, I was hoping to find a female Nidoran over here, but I guess they're are all inside the forest!" she said with a wink. You raised an eyebrow quizzically. She only grinned and pushed you into the forest.

Looking around, you realized that the trees in this forest were interlaced so badly that it almost looked like night. Hell, it was almost as bad as the cave! Anna came in behind you and put her finger on her mouth, telling you to be quiet. She silently sent out Star and Tori. She whispered to Tori, telling her to look for a Nidoran Female. Tori nodded and disappeared into the trees. It wasn't long before she found one and sent Star after it. The peaceful, if creepy, forest was suddenly filled with squeals and hisses as the two fought. The Nidoran was suprisingly strong, and Star went down quickly. Anna called Tori to the rescue, and she dive-bombed the porcupine. Tori opened with some Sand-Attacks, evening the playing field. The Nidoran was overcome by Tori's speed, and succumbed. Anna happily caught it and you revisited the Pokemon Center. Then.....
1113212211211221221222212212121212121111.title: A Brief Foray into Azalea Forest

1113212211211221221222212212121212121111.content:
"I'll name her Espin," Anna said, smiling.

"Name who Espin?" a voice called from the entrance.

Nick whipped around and saw Maya in the doorway. He almost lost it, but he managed to keep his cool and shout, "Hey, Maya! I thought you said you were gonna behind us by like a week!"

She walked over to them, smirking. "Ya, well, I wrapped things up a little sooner than I thought I would."

"That's nice," Anna answered. "Espin is my new Nidoran female."

Maya had a strange look of half approval and annoyance. "Anyway, Nick, you know we haven't gotten to battle yet," she added with a gleam in her eye.

Nick grinned. "You think you can take this? Bring it!"
1113212211211221221222212212121212121111.title: Maya and Nick

1113212211211221221222212212121212121111.content:
"I'll open with Binary," she said, sending out her Porygon and switching back to her green outfit with glasses. She stared at Nick, almost studiously. He shrugged and sent out Gecko. "Conversion!" Binary shifted to a pinkish color.

Thinking quickly, Nick realized it turned into a Psychic type. "Gecko, Leer!" It worked, and the Porygon shuddered.

"Psybeam!" Maya shouted.

"Dodge then use Quick Attack!" Gecko did a sideways flip, then blurred as he dashed into Binary.

"Counter with AST!" Binary vibrated and picked up speed.

Nick's mind raced as he tryed to figure out what AST could possibly mean. He finally understood when the Porygon's edges suddenly Sharpened. "IT'S GONNA TACKLE! DODGE!" Nick was just a split second too late. Gecko had only just registered the command when he got struck with the Tackle. He bled slightly from a few places, but still had plenty in him.

Meanwhile, Maya had her hand on her chin and was trying to decide if she wanted to gamble on Conversion 2. It would either be a Ghost, Rock, or Steel type, and Rock would be bad. I have a 66.6% chance of getting a helpful type. All this in a split second. "Conversion 2! Binary!"
1113212211211221221222212212121212121111.title: Nick Vs. Maya

1113212211211221221222212212121212121111.content:
Maya smirked again when Binary became purple and hazy. "Psybeam again! Keep going 'til you hit!"

Nick's mind raced as he sped through Gecko's moves. Luckily, Gecko dodged Binary's Psybeams without a command. "Use Absorb!" Gecko made a strange face of concentration and green spheres of energy flowed from the Porygon into him. "Keep dodging and Absorbing!"

Maya frowned and shouted, "Agility, then more Psybeams!" Binary picked up more speed, and was now firing at a frightening rate. Gecko dodged several and used Absorb again. He was struck head on just after he finished, and rolled several feet. Luckily, the repeated use of Absorb had healed most of his cuts from the Tackle, so he was feeling somewhat refreshed. Binary was visibly tiring, however.
1113212211211221221222212212121212121111.title: Ghostly Porygon

1113212211211221221222212212121212121111.content:
Gecko narrowly evaded one last Psybeam, then landed yet another Absorb. Binary just couldn't take it any more, and fell apart while reverting to its normal colors. Gecko dashed back towards Nick and jumped in the air. On the way back down he hi-fived Nick.

Maya pressed her watch again, and switched to blue and black. "Don't get cocky, I still have two Pokemon left, and Midnight will dominate!" She chucked another Poke Ball and the Sneasel from the Violet City Gym materialized in front of them. She smirked at Gecko and flashed her claws. "Screech!" Maya shouted. An ear-splitting shriek flew towards Nick and Gecko. Nick's quick reflexes allowed him to cover his ears before the blast hit, but Gecko wasn't so lucky and got a painful earful. "Now Taunt!" Midnight laughed maliciously and said something to Gecko that infuriated him and caused him to use Quick Attack without direction. Midnight, however, disappeared and stabbed Gecko in the back just as he was about to hit her.



"It used Faint Attack....." Nick muttered to himself. "Use a hit-and-run strategy, Gecko! Mix up your moves!" Gecko was almost too angry to comprehend the command, but used a quick series of Absorbs, Pounds, and Quick Attacks to try and overwhelm Midnight. Midnight proved too fast for most of the physical moves to hit, but the Absorbs nearly always hit their mark. Nick realized this and istructed Gecko to use more Absorbs, which now had him healed fully.

Midnight was landing several hits of her own, and landed a Scratch on Gecko's shoulder along with a few more Faint Attacks. Maya could see that they were evenly matched. "Use Assassinate," she said calmly and spookily.

"Damn these code words," Nick said to himself again. Midnight sneered and faded away. Gecko glanced around for his arrogant adversary. Just as Gecko was losing patience, Midnight reappeared. Midnight jabbed him in the stomach, then issued a devastating uppercut to Gecko's chin, which sent him flipping back towards Nick and knocked him out. Nick was baffled until he noticed a layer of ice on the bottom half of Gecko's face. Midnight knew Ice Punch. She cackled again and Nick scowled. He reluctantly recalled Gecko and sent out.....
1113212211211221221222212212121212121111.title: Fighting Midnight

12.content: Firstly, are you a canon Pokemon such as Ash's Pikachu, or are you just some random Pokemon? (Please put made-up Pokemon in their place.)
12.title: PL

1221.content: Which generation are you from?
1221.title: Gen. I-II

12221.content: You are a young male buizel living in Eterna Forest. You are different from other buizels in that you are twice as large as normal buizels. You have no family to speak of and no trainer. You are one of the top pokemon in the forest, with only a few others who could take you on, so you can do pretty much anything you want. You usually live in a small cave by the stream, but sometimes like to sleep somewhere different. You live to have fun and do what pleases you. The question is: what kind of fun do you like?
12221.title: Yes

122212.content:
You slowly open your eyes and stretch, the morning sun peeking through your cave. Once you are up and awake, you go down to the stream and catch a fish for breakfast. Once your stomach is full, you see that you have another need that must be filled. You were twice as large as normal buizels in more ways than one. Normally, you would just masturbate and get on with your day, but today you felt like asserting your authority.

As you wondered how you would take a smaller pokemon for your one-day-slave, your answer popped into sight by some berry bushes down the stream. A cute little riolu stooped by the stream to get a drink. You stealthily climbed into the water and made your way downstream. The riolu wasn't even paying attention as you positioned yourself in front of it and leapt out of the water. It jerked back, but it was too late. You pinned the riolu down and put your muzzle right up to its.

The riolu began to whimper and cry softly, but you did not care about its fear. You decided to look down and see what gender it was. Not that you cared, but it would determine how you would play with it. It was clearly a...
122212.title: Buizel Smut

13.content: So first you will choose the Pokemon that you turn into, then you will choose who you were as a human. You must turn into an unevolved Pokemon, so click the generation your Pokemon is from.
13.title: Human to Pokemon

133.content: Who do you want to be today, who do you want to beeeee!?
133.title: WhoTF r u sppsd 2B?

14.content:
First of all, would you like to post your own fake(s) or use/read about mine?

Be sure to post a general description of your Pokemon, and try to leave an open option to use your Pokemon in different storylines.
14.title: MUS

141.content:
Right now, I have one made up Pokemon. It is the Draugitil family. Ghost/Steel type. They are 50% male or female. Breeding group is Indeterminate.

Draugitil, the first form, is basically a palm-sized ball with red eyes and stubs for legs. Pure Ghost. Ability is Immunity. It evolves into Draugon at level 25.

Draugon, the second form, is the size of two or three microwaves. It now has jointed knees and a short tail. It's head is now seperate from it's body but it has no neck. Pure Ghost. Ability is Immunity. It evolves into Draugur when you trade it with a Metal Coat.

Draugur weighs about as much as the average Onix. It's the size of a compact car. It's tail is now about as long as it's body. It now has bluish-silver armor with grooves and markings. Most of it's weight is in the armor. It has armor down it's back and tail with some spikes. There is a metal crest/helmet on it's head and shinguard-like things on it's legs. It actually walks on the tips of these, however. It can fire these metal pieces and control them when they are detached from it's body. It can also retract all the metal parts into a ball, facilitating the use of moves such as Gyro Ball, Rollout, etc. It's now Ghost/Steel type. It's ability is now Battle Armor and/or Rock Head. In my stories, all these it can use either type of Curse.

BASE STATS
-------------------------
HP 25 55 90
AT 55 75 100
DF 25 55 100
SA 55 75 100
SD 55 70 100

141.title: Mattlantis's Fakes

info.brief_description: A Pokémon story where anything can happen! Fake Pokémon welcome! GP for good chapters!
info.description:
A Pokémon adventure where nearly anything can happen! To start off, you will choose a game type. Then you will choose a few other related specs, such as what species of Pokémon you are, your gender, etc. If you choose to be a Pokémon or to transform into a Pokémon, you can choose any one you want! (Excluding evolved forms. This makes the story more interesting.) This story is more realistic than the TV series, however. For example, blood exists.


Rules

1. Use proper grammar. Writing without it is difficult to read.
2. Anything is allowed, but if you are adding a "gray" chapter, (sex, vore, scat) PLEASE FOR THE LOVE OF GOD give us a choice whether or not these things happen, and maybe after that you can add a choice chapter about how detailed or what kind of stuff should happen. 1 way chapter ends WILL BE EDITED!
3. Don't make your chapters extremely short or long, unless they are only choice chapters.

(I just re-vamped a fair bit of this interactive. I have decided that instead of those nice, orderly, and lengthy choice chapters, just throw in your own storylines wherever they fit. Just be sure to leave a space open for more, or I'll make one!)


Enjoy!
